# load data

```{r}
##### load NDB ##### 
indata<- read_csv("indata/DSCRTP_NatDB_20210414-0.csv",
                 col_types = cols(.default = "c"),
                 locale = locale(encoding = 'ISO-8859-1'),
                 na = c("-999", "NA"))

filt <- indata %>%
  filter(Flag == "0")

## check

rm(indata)
```
